tips.quotes: Bottoms in the investment world don't end with four-year lows, they end with 10 or 15-year lows.
tips.author: Jim Rogers

tips.quotes: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
tips.author: Warren Buffett

tips.quotes: The best time to buy is when there's blood in the streets.
tips.author: Sir John Templeton

tips.quotes: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
tips.author: Philip Fisher

tips.quotes: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
tips.author: Benjamin Franklin

tips.quotes: With a good perspective on history, we can have a better understanding of the past and present, and thus a clear vision of the future.
tips.author: Carlos Slim Helu

tips.quotes: It's not whether you're right or wrong that's important, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong
tips.author: George Soros

tips.quotes: Given a 10% chance of a 100 times payoff, you should take that bet every time.
tips.author: Jeff Bezos

tips.quotes: Don't look for the needle in the haystack. Just buy the haystack!
tips.author: John Bogle

tips.quotes: I don't look to jump over seven-foot bars; I look around for one-foot bars that I can step over.
tips.author: Warren Buffett

tips.quotes: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
tips.author: Robert Arnott

tips.quotes: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
tips.author: Robert G. Allen

tips.quotes: Courage taught me no matter how bad a crisis gets ... any sound investment will eventually pay off.
tips.author: Carlos Slim Helu

tips.quotes: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
tips.author: Ben Graham

tips.quotes: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.
tips.author: Mellody Hobson

tips.quotes: Returns matter a lot. It's our capital.
tips.author: Abigail Johnson

tips.quotes: Know what you own, and know why you own it.
tips.author: Peter Lynch

tips.quotes: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
tips.author: Paul Samuelson

tips.quotes: The four most dangerous words in investing are, itâ€™s different this time.
tips.author: Sir John Templeton

tips.quotes: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
tips.author: Warren Buffett

tips.quotes: The most contrarian thing of all is not to oppose the crowd but to think for yourself.
tips.author: Peter Thiel
